segment_text: And my aunt had just handed me a glass of champagne,
and I warned her to be careful.
This happened during my cousin's wedding reception,
she spotted a bee hovering near my face,
My best friend pushed me into the pool.
So that's when she gave me a little shove,
and she tried to save me from being stung.
and my cousin just says, "Just about a few inches more," she says, "and you'd have landed on the cake."
where everyone was dressed to impress.
- this was at a fancy hotel garden -
When I resurfaced, gasping for air,
and I tumbled into the water.
'Course friends, y'know, they don't always think things through.
and naturally, the first thing to do was to get out and dry off,
And... my beautiful dress was ruined,
